Package com.android.build.transform.api

Interface Summary
AsInputTransform A Transform that writes the input streams in matching output streams.
CombinedTransform A Transform that combines all the input streams into a single output stream.
ForkTransform A transform that creates an additional output stream on top of its regular output.
NoOpTransform A Transform that only reads the input stream.
ScopedContent Represent content manipulated during the build.
Transform A Transform that processes build content.
TransformInput The input to a Transform
TransformOutput The output of a transform, as used during the actual Transform.
 

Enum Summary
ScopedContent.ContentType The type of of the content.
ScopedContent.Format The format in which the content is represented.
ScopedContent.Scope The scope of the content.
Transform.Type How the transform consumes (or not) its input streams.
TransformInput.FileStatus The file changed status for incremental execution.
 

Exception Summary
TransformException An exception during the execution of a Transform
